body.name: COMI Wide Neck Glass Breastmilk Collection n Storage Bottle, 6oz with Screw Ring Sealing Disk; Re-markable Sealing Disc. BPA Free, Fits Breast Pumps & Nipples (2 Pack Pink Lids)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 13 mins
features: It is essential to ensure the safety of breast milk: the bottle body is made of food-grade borosilicate glass. While ensuring that it can be refrigerated, heated and stored at normal temperature, it does not contain any harmful substances, and there will be no plastic smell seeping into the baby's milk (the penetration of harmful substances will lead to plastic smell). There is no need to worry about the safety of breast milk. All parts can be disassembled for cleaning.

Three-in-one wide-necked glass bottle is used for pumping, storing and feeding: the bottle is suitable for the Breast Pumps & Nipples, so mothers can pump, store and feed with the same glass bottle to reduce the transfer of breast milk and save precious breast milk.

100% leak proof and 10 ml fine measurement mark: silicone sealing disc is used, so there is no need to worry about leakage; The bottle has a 10 ml increment measurement mark. You know how much milk you produce. The ballpoint pen can be written on sealing disk to mark important matters. The mark can be erased and marked circularly.

It can ensure the safety of infants and young children: The bottle has a strong resistance to falling. When used, it can not only guarantee the use time limit of the bottle, but also avoid the safety hazards brought to infants due to broken glass. Glass bottles are not only healthier for infants, but also easier to clean than plastic bottles, because glass bottles are unlikely to leave residue and odor scratches.

Our commitment: be ready to become a fanatic. As parents, we know how important it is to only use the best products for our children, so all of our products have a problem-free refund policy. If you are not happy, neither are we. Just contact us and we will provide you with VIP services.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breast Milk Bottle With Leak Proof Cap It is not only resistant to stains and smells, but also heat-resistant and heat-shock resistant glass. Its allowable temperature difference is 270 degrees Fahrenheit (150 degrees Celsius). The bottle mouth is compatible with the flange of Avent manual pump and Avent electric pump, and the closed collar is used with Avent natural nipple, so mothers can use the same glass bottle to suck, store and feed milk to reduce the transfer of breast milk, preserve precious breast milk and provide nutrition for babies. There is no BPA, BPF, BPS and phthalate.

Pump Compatibility Compatible with all Evenflo Feeding breast pumps and most other standard neck breast pump brands. Pump to Feed The Advanced Breast Milk Collection Bottles are compatible with the Balance + Standard Neck Nipple. Can Be Written Repeatedly The time of breast milk can be recorded on a silicone cover, as well as other important matters. Can Be Refrigerated Breastmilk bottles can be stored in a refrigerator.

Safe Use of Breastmilk Bottles The breastmilk storage bottle consists of a sealing disk, a low screw cap, and a glass bottle body.BPA/BPS free.Screw cap and sealing disc are specially designed to prevent bottle leakage. Perfect for freezing, traveling, flying and camping.Glass bottles are not only healthier for infants, but also easier to clean than plastic bottles, because glass bottles are unlikely to produce residual and odor scratches.
Glass Drinking 6pcs Tea Bottle Glass Travel Coffee Tumbler Glass Travel Coffee Tumbler Coffee Mugs High Borosilicate Glass ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ no BPA ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I love these! I ordered them needing something better than the tubes from the hospital to store milk after pumping before I put it in the freezer bags and these work perfectly. They are nice quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for storage
reviews.reviewText: I am an EBF and these are great to store my letdown until there’s enough to freeze. I have washed and sterilized them for about a month now and the measurements are not worn out. Convenient if I need to put a nipple on it for a feeding instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dribbles when you pour
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to store my breast milk in the fridge. I love the glass, the lid, and the overall style but unfortunately two of my jars don’t pour neatly and I risk wasting milk! If this didn’t happen I’d give it five stars but (for my use) this is too big an issue.Edit: Seller reached out to help fix the issue. For that reason (in addition to the stellar quality of materials) I have increased my rating to 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It feels like I am being far less wasteful using these vs the bags. I also found that I can write the date / time on the top with a dry erase marker and it washes off very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these bottles. I wanted something glass to heat bottles of milk. Unfortunately the description is wrong from what I’ve experienced in terms of nipple compatibility. They do not fit the evenflo balance + standard nipples. They DO fit the wide neck nipples. I ordered the standard nipples trusting this description and was very sad when I got them and found that they did not fit. I already had the wide neck ones from bottles I already had so we found a solution but I spent $16 on nipples I will not use.If you also plan on using these as more than just milk collection/storage make sure you get the correct size nipple. They are great otherwise and I would definitely recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s glass. Hasn’t faded with the many times I’ve washed it. Doesn’t leak for me. I use it to cool my freshly pumped milk before adding it to the already cooled milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage bottles
reviews.reviewText: Really like these bottles. Great top

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but are messy
reviews.reviewText: We got these because I'm not a fan of using plastic.. initially I loved them but learned they leak like crazy. If you have to pour anything out of them expect the liquid to run down the side and all over the counter. Then when you put the cap back on the liquid around the top continues to drop down the side. Once we figured out what was going on we just made sure to have a paper towel every time we used them. It was just a little annoying is all

reviews.reviewTitle: Fits the spectra flanges and pigeon nipples!

reviews.reviewText: These 🍼 are beautiful, durable and Worth the every penny.
Bottles are only 6 oz. Listing says 9oz. I bought because I needed bigger bottles will not work
